Introduction

HONEYST (Korean: 허니스트; Japanese: はちみつST) was a four-member boy band under FNC Entertainment. They were part of FNC's trainee system "NEOZ School" and took part in Mnet's survival show d.o.b (Dance or Band) as the NEOZ Band team but lost to the dance team which debuted as SF9.

They debuted on May 17, 2017 with their first single album "Like You". On April 26, 2019, FNC announced the group had officially disbanded.

Their name is a combination of "Honey" and "Artist".
